attributes.action: revise the "clexane" discharge policy at Warrington hospital
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I always said I wouldn't be one of those professionals who said, "In my day, it was always said", but ...

Since when are patients discharged whilst still taking intra - muscular injections ? Anti - coagulated patients NEED clotting monitored - this is in accordance with NHS targets to reduce deaths from cardio - vascular diseases and strokes. The petitioner is calling on the P.M. to review the inconsistencies of the practice of injection self - medicating - it's dangerous. Are you really so pushed for beds ?
